name: Roll 'n Match - GMTK 2022
description:
Your goal is to match the value of your dice with the number on the screen as many times as you can before time runs out. You will need to try to remember where the faces of the dice are while you frantically move around trying to beat the ever faster ticking clock.

Controls (also listed in game under 'Tutorial'):

- WASD for movement (A/D for horizontal movement, W/S for forward/backward movement).

- SPACE to select your current dice face for input.

- R to reset your position (in case of emergency).

- Esc to open/close the main menu.
